name: Locked Out
description:
Voted Weirder Stuff's Most Original Game
Placed 4th Overall

A mentally disabled child is locked outside at night and must navigate to the safety of the table by touch and memory.

This game intended to be learned through trial and error and only minimal instructions are provided in game. Feel free to download the instructions below if this is too much for you.

This game was made by one person from scratch in under 48 hours.

An entry for the Weirder Stuff game jam, placed 4th Overall and 1st in Originality.

An updated version can be downloaded below, while the original version can be played in the browser above.

This game was designed and created independently and as such it has no digital publisher certificate so it is very likely to be flagged by your screening software. Thus far the software has proven safe, do not be worried, simply tell your screening software to download/run the program anyway. The way to do this is unique to each software and as such I can not guide you through the process.
